name: Dash King: Prototype
description:
Dash King: Prototype is a dash-based combat proof of concept game.

Controls:
WASD to Move
Left click to dash towards the cursor, marking enemies hit by the dash
E or Right Click to execute marked enemies
Q to parry incoming bullets towards the cursor, stunning enemies they hit.
P to Pause.

This game was built with Oak in about a month of after-work hobby time.

Audio is not supported in browser currently. Chrome seems to perform best out of the browsers we've tested.
